DOC.brief_title: Clinical Investigation Corneal Incision Size After Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) Implantation
DOC.criteria: Able comprehend sign statement inform consent ; Willing able complete require postoperative visit ; Cataract ; Planned cataract removal phacoemulsification ; Calculated lens power 18.0 27.0 D inclusive ; Preoperative astigmatism < 1.0D ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Systemic disease affect cornea ; Any inflammation edema cornea ; Previous plan refractive corneal surgery subject 's participation study ; Previous corneal transplant ; Previous retinal detachment ; Pregnancy lactation , current plan , course study ; Current participation another investigational drug device study may confound result investigation ; Any condition observe surgery surgeon 's medical opinion may affect success cataract surgery ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
